definition: the world/this world/the world of the living
world with only two people (usually refers to a romantic couple)/romantic couple's world

sentences.english: The good he did will live after him.
sentences.chinese: 他生前做的好事将永留人世。

sentences.english: To succeed in the world we must look foolish but be wise.
sentences.chinese: 要在人世间取得成功，我们心须大智若愚。

sentences.english: There is a limit to the amount of creative talent available in the world.
sentences.chinese: 人世间的创造力是有一定限度的。

sentences.english: The good which he did will live after him.
sentences.chinese: 他生前做的好事将永留人世。

sentences.english: Yamaguchi died Monday at the age of 93.
sentences.chinese: 本周一山口疆辞别了人世，享年93岁。

sentences.english: Innocence are the most valuable things in the human world, we rectifiable is it.
sentences.chinese: 纯真是人世间最可贵的东西，我们可求的就是它。

sentences.english: Fortune reigns in gifts of the world, not in lineament of nature .
sentences.chinese: 命运之神是人世间恩惠的主宰，不能支配自然的相貌。

sentences.english: He lives a turbulent life and has experienced many difficulties in the world.
sentences.chinese: 他一生坎坷，经历过人世间许多苦难。

sentences.english: If you were born, then you are good enough.
sentences.chinese: 只要你生于人世，你便已足够优秀。

sentences.english: I haven't heard of him ofr ages; perhaps he is not alive now.
sentences.chinese: 我多年没有他的音信，或许他现在已不在人世。

sentences.english: Let me more happy, also be to the human world trip.
sentences.chinese: 让自己多点开心点，也不枉为来人世间旅行一趟。

sentences.english: Innocence are the most valuable things in the human world, is it our rectifiable .
sentences.chinese: 纯真是人世间最可贵的东西，我们可求的就是它。

sentences.english: Broken hearts of people, how long wandering in the world?
sentences.chinese: 碎了心的人，能在人世飘零多久？
房婴儿从不会孤单来到人世。

definition: to leave one's mortal frame (idiom)/to die
lit. to fly on a crane to the Western Paradise/fig. to pass away (idiom)
affairs of life/things of the world
see 駕鶴西去|驾鹤西去[jia4 he4 xi1 qu4]
see 駕鶴西去|驾鹤西去[jia4 he4 xi1 qu4]
life (as the characteristic of living beings)/living being/creature/CL:個|个[ge4],條|条[tiao2]
to be all alone in the world
